Translations.Text: DEUS wishes redeem VOS DUM those pursue their lusts wish VOS deviate MAJOR deviation
DEUS wishes lighten VOS burden human est created INFIRMUS
O vos believe non consume each others' properties illicitly - Unus mutually acceptable transactions permitted Vos non kill! DEUS est Merciful towards VOS
Anyone commits these transgressions maliciously deliberately nos condemn eum to Hell. Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
Vos refrain ex committing gross sins prohibited vos nos remit tuus sins admit vos prenobilis admittance
Vos non covet qualities bestowed upon each alius de DEUS; vir enjoy certain qualities femina enjoy certain qualities! Vos implore DEUS shower vos His gratia. DEUS est fully aware de TOTUS things
Pro each de vos nos designated shares inheritance sinister de parentes relatives. Alias those related to vos copulati vos dedit them their due share DEUS TESTIS TOTUS things
